title: Context-Based U-Learning Course for Improving Fitness-Related English Reading Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension skills and general understanding of fitness equipment
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive learning environment utilizing personal mobile devices and fitness center VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret English texts explaining fitness equipment usage with 80% accuracy
Learners can explain 50 fitness-related English terms by applying them to real exercise contexts
Learners can complete English reading tasks in fitness center environments through a QR code-based u-learning system with over 90% completion rate
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
